app.title: SpinzTheWheelz
app.heading: Yes No Picker Wheel - Get Random Decisions
app.description: Decide yes or no by spinning the wheel. Get random yes or no answers for your questions, overcome decision paralysis, and make choices easily.

wheel.mobileInstructions: Swipe or tap on the wheel to spin

results.noResults: No results yet. Spin the wheel to start!

guide.title: Yes No Wheel Guide
guide.preview: Discover how to make better decisions with our Yes No Wheel. Learn techniques to overcome decision paralysis, understand when random choices are appropriate, and make the most of this powerful decision-making tool.

share.title: Share Your Results
share.noResults: No results yet. Spin the wheel to get results you can share!

footer.about: The ultimate yes/no decision wheel to help you make random decisions quickly and easily
